feed.title: Lucia Jeon’s Blog
feed.subtitle: Reach out to me via Linkedin .

entry.title: Welcome!
entry.content:
Hello!

I am Lucia and I develop software.

I graduated from NYU Tandon School of Engineering in January 2022, with a major in CS and minor in Math. While in NYU, I was part of an exchange student program with Yonsei University in Seoul, Korea.

Currently, I’m working as a developer at a platform startup in Korea, focusing on our own AI model, backend code, data crawling, and etc.

If you want to reach out to me, always feel free to contact me via Linkedin or email me at luciaajeon@gmail.com.
entry.summary: Hello! I am Lucia and I develop software. I graduated from NYU Tandon School of Engineering in January 2022, with a major in CS and minor in Math. While in NYU, I was part of an exchange student program with Yonsei University in Seoul, Korea. Currently, I’m working as a developer at a platform startup in Korea, focusing on our own AI model, backend code, data crawling, and etc. If you want to reach out to me, always feel free to contact me via Linkedin or email me at luciaajeon@gmail.com.
